title: Canada's Forest Trust
part1_para1: An opportunity for youth, families, farmers, landowners, Indigenous communities, and corporate Canada to come together to build a better environment and achieve a net-zero future.
part2_para2: When you invest in a Smart Forest, we keep you informed on its progress - from site selection to planting to ongoing maintenance and carbon and biodiversity footprint impact. CFT manages the forest landscape from the moment you buy your forest.
part2_step1box1: Identify appropriate areas for Smart Forests across Canada
part2_step1box2: Secure seedlings that will thrive in the local environment
part2_step2para1: Assess, plan, and complete site preparation for planting.
part2_step2box1: Identify appropriate areas for Smart Forests across Canada
part2_step2box2: Secure seedlings that will thrive in the local environment
part2_step3para1: Strategically plant seedlings to ensure optimal growth and carbon sequestration.
part2_step3box1: Identify appropriate areas for Smart Forests across Canada
part2_step3box2: Secure seedlings that will thrive in the local environment
part2_step4para1: Perform innovative forest management activities to maintain the forest and maximize its impact.
part2_step4box1: Identify appropriate areas for Smart Forests across Canada
part2_step4box2: Secure seedlings that will thrive in the local environment
part2_step5para1: Audit, and set a no clear-cut guarantee on every forest.
part2_step5box1: Identify appropriate areas for Smart Forests across Canada
part2_step5box2: Secure seedlings that will thrive in the local environment
part3_header1: Start making a difference now—and far into the future
part3_para1: Each Smart Forest has a **‘planting prescription’**. This is the unique mix of species that’s right for the local climate, soil conditions, drainage, and land history. This optimal habitat maximizes the positive impacts the Forest will make, including carbon sequestration, oxygen production and water absorption.
part3_box1para1: Meet ESG goals and demonstrate results
part3_box2para1: Give students the tools to positively impact their future
part3_box3para1: Protect the planet for future generations
part3_box5para1: Make your impact on climate change, now and for generations to come.
part4_para1: Don’t just care for the environment. Prove it.
part4_para2: If ESG is not a box you’d like to tick, but a change you’d like to make, work with us.
part4_para3: An investment in a Corporate Smart Forest is an opportunity for corporations across Canada to reimagine their sustainability strategy and invest for long-term ROI. This is a turnkey and sustainable approach for corporations to meet net-zero and ESG commitments, offering:
part4_box1para: Calculate your net-zero carbon footprint and determine the size of forest needed to offset your emissions.
part4_box2para: A secure, customized portal to watch your forest grow and build engagement campaigns that bring the journey to life for shareholders, employees, and customers.
part4_box3para: Demonstrate your commitment to sustainability and the significance of your impact with a no clear-cut guarantee on each Smart Forest. Keep stakeholders informed with an annual report on performance.
part4_quote1para: “We need 50 shades of green to catalyze and support all companies towards net zero… Companies will need to show how they plan to meet their net-zero targets through the appropriate mix of emission reductions and credible carbon offsets, including nature-based solutions such as reforestation.”
part4_quote2para: “[Younger generations] have a different kind of investment in the future…A lot of the adults in the world aren’t going to be here by the time some climate conditions start taking effect in the world.”
part4_header2: From balance sheet to bottom line.
part4_para4: Corporate Smart Forests are good for the environment and for your business.
part4_balanceheader: An investment in a Smart Forest allows your corporation to:
part4_balancepara1: Drive immediate CO2 reductions from the atmosphere
part4_balancepara2: Secure ESG benefits that protect and foster growth throughout Canada
part4_balancepara3: Reduce your cumulative impacts on the environment and society
part4_balancepara4: Boost the economy through the creation of local jobs
part4_balancepara5: Add shareholder value by strengthening long-term financial and operational performance
part4_calcbox1para: Learn how much carbon your corporation generates in an average year.
part4_calcbox2header: Determine your net zero Smart Forest target
part4_calcbox2para: See how many acres your corporation must plant to reach a net-zero emissions target.
part5_para1: Study climate action in real time.
part5_para2: Student Smart Forests protect our planet and teach us how to tackle climate change.
part5_para3: From climate strikes to online activism, students are taking action on climate change. With their future at stake, they’re looking for meaningful ways to steer things back on course.
part5_box1para: A Smart Forest offers an opportunity to educate students about environmental stewardship with digital tools to track its effects in real time.
part5_box2para: An easy-to-execute program that taps into students’ interests and demonstrates its immediate and long-term benefits.
part5_box3para: The School Smart Forest™ Ambassadors program names the environmental stewards who have created a more sustainable future for all.
part5_quote1para: “Time is much shorter than we think. Failure means disaster. The changes required are enormous and we must all contribute in every part of our daily life. Especially us in the rich countries where no nation is doing nearly enough.”
part5_quote2para: “[Younger generations] have a different kind of investment in the future…A lot of the adults in the world aren’t going to be here by the time some climate conditions start taking effect in the world.”
part5_header2: Students make great teachers. Give them a forest to manage.
part5_para4: Spark a life-long connection to the environment and teach valuable skills.
part5_balanceheader: Raising funds to build a forest is:
part5_balancepara1: **Healthy.** Zero calories and carbon-free. No sales of chocolate bars, cookie dough or other consumable items.
part5_balancepara2: **Sustainable.** No packaging or unused products. Forest stewardship reduces the carbon footprint of all Canadians.
part5_balancepara3: **Safe, Secure and Easy.** All transactions are online, No door-to-door sales, cash handling, or post-fundraising deliveries required.
part5_balancepara4: **Impactful.** Supports the health of the planet, scholarships, student employment, school programs, and community needs.
part5_balancepara5: **Empowering.** Enables students to take action against the devastating effects of climate change, inspires leadership and builds organizational skills.
part5_header3: Get involved in the future today.
part5_para5: Work with our team to establish a secure online program to sell seedlings for your School Forest. Your school keeps 50% of proceeds to support school initiatives.
part5_calcbox1para: Learn how much carbon your corporation generates in an average year.
part5_calcbox2header: Determine your net zero Smart Forest target
part5_calcbox2para: See how many acres your corporation must plant to reach a net-zero emissions target.
part6_para1: Leave a legacy that will grow for centuries.
part6_para2: Give cleaner air, thriving wildlife habitats, and a healthier planet to future generations.
part6_para3: A Legacy Forest is your opportunity to invest in the future of our planet. Diversify your portfolio with acres of reforested land, plentiful wildlife, cleaner air and water preservation. It's an investment that will pay off with lasting environmental, social, and economic returns for all Canadians in the years to come.
part6_box1para: A Smart Forest offers an opportunity to educate students about environmental stewardship with digital tools to track its effects in real time.
part6_box2para: An easy-to-execute program that taps into students’ interests and demonstrates its immediate and long-term benefits.
part6_box3para: The School Smart Forest™ Ambassadors program names the environmental stewards who have created a more sustainable future for all.
part6_quote1para: We are running the most dangerous experiment in history right now, which is to see how much carbon dioxide the atmosphere can handle before there is a climate catastrophe.”
part6_quote2para: “[Younger generations] have a different kind of investment in the future…A lot of the adults in the world aren’t going to be here by the time some climate conditions start taking effect in the world.”

part7_para1: From climate strikes to online activism, students are speaking out against climate change. They know it’s their future at stake and want to be part of the solution – and Canada’s Forest Trust offers a simple way to do just that.
part7_box1para1: With a 100-year no clear-cut guarantee on each Smart Forest™, plus insurance and an annual report on performance, you can feel confident about the impact you’re making.
part7_box2para1: Calculate your carbon footprint and determine the size of forest needed to offset that footprint.
part7_box3para1: Use our secure, customized portal to watch your forest grow and build engagement campaigns that bring the journey to life for employees, customers and shareholders.
part7_box4para1: Use our secure, customized portal to watch your forest grow and build engagement campaigns that bring the journey to life for employees, customers and shareholders.
part7_para2: Try our unparalled calculator software to see what your impact could look like!
part7_step1para1: Calculate how much carbon your corporation must offset to reach net-zero.
part7_step2para1: Calculate how many hectares of Smart Forests your corporation must plant to reach net-zero.
part7_step3para1: Calculate how many hectares of Smart Forests your corporation must plant to reach net-zero.
part7_quote1para1: We need 50 shades of green to catalyze and support all companies towards net zero… Companies will need to show how they plan to meet their net-zero targets through the appropriate mix of emission reductions and credible carbon offsets, including nature-based solutions such as reforestation.
part7_quote1para3: UN Special Envoy for Climate Action and Finance
part7_quote2para1: Time is much shorter than we think. Failure means disaster. The changes required are enormous and we must all contribute in every part of our daily life. Especially us in the rich countries where no nation is doing nearly enough.
part7_benefitspara1: By investing in Smart Forests™ across Canada, your corporation will:
part7_benefitsbox1: Support immediate CO2 reductions from the atmosphere.
part7_benefitsbox2: Reap ESG benefits that protect and foster growth throughout Canada.
part7_benefitsbox3: Reduce your corporation’s cumulative impacts on the environment and society.
part7_benefitsbox4: Add shareholder value by strengthening long-term performance.
